entityDefinitions.name: RuleStatusDescriptor
entityDefinitions.description: The status of a validation rule.

entityDefinitions.name: RunStatusDescriptor
entityDefinitions.description: The status of the validation run.

entityDefinitions.name: ValidationLogicTypeDescriptor
entityDefinitions.description: The specific programing language (or pseudo-code) used to specify the rule

entityDefinitions.name: ValidationResult

locallyDefinedProperties.description: The namespace that this validation result is associatied with. This could be used to control access.
An identifier for the resource related to this validation result.
Tht type of reference identified with the ReferenceId.
An identifier for this validation result, unique within the validation run.

entityDefinitions.description: A specific example of a situation that has been identified in a validation run.

entityDefinitions.name: ValidationResultAdditionalContext

locallyDefinedProperties.description: Provides the actual value of the data.

entityDefinitions.description: All of the remaining details from the validation results in a JSON string.

entityDefinitions.name: ValidationRule

locallyDefinedProperties.description: This is non-structured ASCII text that will include the verbose details that were used in the evaluation of the validation rule.
A reference to an external id for the rule.
A link to more information about the rule and how to resolve it.
uniquely identifies a rule in a Collection
This is non-structured ASCII text that will include the short details that were used in the evaluation of the validation rule.
If applicable, the SQL statement that identifies the validation situation.

entityDefinitions.description: A rule that will find specific examples of invalid data.

entityDefinitions.name: ValidationRun

locallyDefinedProperties.description: A reference to the EdFi Ods that the validation egine ran agianst.
A reference to the specific rules engine that ran the validation.
The datetime that the validation run finished, as recorded by the engine
An identifier for the validation run that wil differentiate it from other validation runs from the same engine on the same Ods.
The datetime that the validation run started, as recorded by the engine

entityDefinitions.description: A run of a validation engine.
